title: Recommendation
content:
Hi all,

Can anyone make a recommendation. I am looking for a curvy, sold font. Something along the lines of Ronda but with a more rounded f character, if that makes sense, also not too keen on the e and the r. I quite like the font; Oh Sweet Pea, all though too over the top, I really like the g on TS Koblenz.

Its for a font.

Appreciate any recommendations, I really want to get a solid curvy font, similar to above. I am considering creating a custom font, well just the letters I need, I have done this one before, took me ages.

Thanks
author: reboot

comments.content:
I’m not sure I understand what you’re looking for: Sweat Pea is a handwriting font, while Koblenz is a geometric sans-serif (and a Kabel knock-off)…

Come to think of it, maybe you’d like [Coquette?](http://web.archive.org/web/20061127050516/http:/www.ms-studio.com/FontSales/coquette.html)
Maybe not Oh Sweet Pea actually.

 [Tschicholina](http://web.archive.org/web/20061127050516/http:/www.fontshop.com/showfont.cfm?fid=TO.112532.0.0)
